content.title: Carol Enache
text: An ambitious and highly motivated Web Developer who wants to progress further. I am a team player that has a desire to create great user experiences, demonstrate analytical thinking and have excellent communication skills. I have a passion for technology and I am keen on progress.

content.title: Portfolio
text: To discover more about my work and research, please visit my Blog. By clicking the button below you will navigate directly to my personal blog where I share my passion for technology. I am publishing on weekly basis new discoveries I have made in coding and programing in general. Your feedback is important to me, please feel free to leave your comments.

link.text: Click to visit the Blog page
